title: Releases | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs:
New releases of Snowflake are deployed each week. In addition, new features and new versions
of Snowsight, clients, drivers, libraries, and Snowflake Connectors are released between these weekly releases.

Release notes for Snowflake weekly releases, new releases of Snowsight, and new features
released between weekly releases.
For the most recent release note announcements, see Snowflake weekly, Snowsight, and feature release notes.
Release notes for Streamlit in Snowflake.

Release notes and support information on clients (such as
SnowSQL and Snowflake CLI), drivers (such as the JDBC driver, ODBC driver, and the Snowflake Connector for Python), and libraries
(such as the Snowpark API and the Snowflake Python APIs).

Release notes for Snowflake Connectors, which provide native integration of third-party applications and database systems in
Snowflake (for example, Snowflake Connector for ServiceNow).
Summaries of recent features that improve performance.
Summaries of recent features that make it easier to write simpler SQL.
Information about preview features in Snowflake.
